Text: Hey, old man! What are you doing back?

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Just get in the damn car. Now.
[There’s a quiet, chubby Chinese guy in the car with them.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: And you are…

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: This is our friend, Mr. Chu.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Alright… So what the hell’s going on, Leo? What is this?
[Usually calm, Leo looks pretty pissed off.]

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: This is about you. You fucked up good, didn’t you? Started a fucking war.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Got no idea what you’re talking about

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Don’t fuck with me, boy. I probably forgotten more about this business than you’ll ever learn. Half our guys are dead, half of Mr. Chu’s guys are dead, and now the Feds are breathing down everybody’s necks, because of you.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Leo, listen-

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: You listen - if it wasn’t for me, you would’ve already been taken care of. So you’re gonna listen to what I have to say and you’re gonna listen good. What you did in Chinatown that was because of that cocksucker Henry, right? You know who he was working for when he died?

Speaker: Vito
Text: You mean when he was butchered?

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: He was working for the Feds. He was a fuckin’ rat. That’s why Mr. Chu’s people did what they did. And that’s why the Feds are going after Carlo now. But I don’t forget my friends, Vito. You did for me, so I did for you. I called in a few favors, got you one chance to make this right.

Speaker: Vito
Text: OK. I’m listening.

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: You’re gonna get rid of Carlo, do us all a favor.

Speaker: Vito
Text: And if I refuse?

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: You die. Frank and the rest of the Commission want you dead. So does Mr. Chu. And to top it all off, you vouched for a rat. You think Carlo’s gonna let that slide? You’re a dead man walking.

Speaker: Vito
Text: When?

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Now. Every minute we wait is another minute we give to the Feds. He’s holed up at that observatory of his. He knows something’s up Carlo Falcone slot of thing but stupid ain’t one of ‘em.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Alright. Stop the car.

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Remember, kid - this is your last chance.
[Vito gets out of the car in the pouring rain. He has to kill the head of the Falcone family. He’s going to the observatory.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: Hey, fellas.

Speaker: Guard
Text: Hey Vito. The boss wants to see you.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Good. I wanna see him too.

Speaker: Guard 2
Text: One uh… One thing though, Vito… I gotta take your gun.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Yeah alright, here you go.
[He pulls out a gun and kills them both. There’s no turning back. Vito’s walking over the dead bodies of his colleagues and friends to the planetarium, the central room of the observatory.]

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: Well, look who it is… This is who they send? This is an insult. What’d they tell you, Vito? Take care of me and all’s forgiven? You really think they’re just gonna let you walk after everything you did? Then again chumps like you never do think about the big picture… But your buddy Joe understands, don’t you Joe?
[Vito feels his head touched by a cold steel revolver.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: What the fuck is this?

Speaker: Joe
Text: I could ask you the same question.

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: Loyalty’s a funny thing, huh, Vito? No such thing as friendship in this business. Didn’t your old pal Leo teach you that while you were sucking his cock back in the can? Hahaha… You’re just a fucking pawn, Vito. That’s all you ever were. When are you gonna realize that?

Speaker: Vito
Text: Joe - you just gotta trust me.

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: You think I give a shit about the Feds, or those tired old fucks on the Commission? They’re using you Vito… Just like Clemente used you. Just like I used you. Just like that rat fuck Henry used you. You vouched for that piece of shit, brought him into my house. And now, you dumb fuck, you’re gonna pay for it. Now, Joe.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Hey. If you’re gonna pull that trigger, do it already.

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: What are you waiting for?

Speaker: Joe
Text: Vito… Let’s shoot this cocksucker. On three.

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: Remember what we talked about Joe! You gonna throw that all away!? Do it!

Speaker: Vito
Text: One…

Speaker: Joe
Text: Two…

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: NOW!
[They turn around and start shooting at Falcone’s men.]

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: Goddammit! Somebody kill these two psychos! You dumb bastard, you don’t stand a chance. You can’t kill ‘em all… You really are insane aren’t you? I’m going to enjoy watching you die. Come on already. There’s only two of ‘em. Ha, ha, ha. Oh, I kinda miss this. Reminds me of my Prohibition days.
[Vito and Joe manage to kill all of Carlo Falcone’s men and mortally wounded him.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: You know something, Carlo? For the last 10 years, all done was kill. I killed for my country…
[He’s shooting at Carlo. He’s trying to crawl away.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: I killed for my family.

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: Ugh!
[He’s shooting at Carlo again.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: I killed anybody that got in my way.
[He’s shooting at Carlo one more time.]

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: Ugh!

Speaker: Vito
Text: But this one… This one’s for me.

Speaker: Carlo Falcone
Text: Fuck… you…
[Vito shoots him in the head.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: Fucking prick…

Speaker: Joe
Text: I sure as hell hope you know what you’re doing here.
[They’re heading out of the observatory.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: Don’t worry, I took care of it. You’ll see. So uh, what was he talking about back there?

Speaker: Joe
Text: Nothing, he made me an offer. That’s all.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Yeah, I figured out that much. What kind of offer?

Speaker: Joe
Text: He wanted me to whack you. Said he’d make me a capo, give me my own crew. You know, pretty much everything I ever wanted.

Speaker: Vito
Text: Yeah? So why the hell didn’t you do it?

Speaker: Joe
Text: Remember that five bucks you owe me?
[Leo Galante and a lot of men are waiting for them on the way out.]

Speaker: Joe
Text: What the hell is this?

Speaker: Vito
Text: It’s alright, Joe.

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Is it done?

Speaker: Vito
Text: It’s done.

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Alright then. Looks like a celebration is in order. C’mon, let’s head to the cathouse.

Speaker: Joe
Text: Sounds good to me.

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Come with me, Vito. There’s more we need to talk about.

Speaker: Joe
Text: Alright, well see you over there.
[He gets into the second car with Leo’s men. Both cars are leaving.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: Alright. So what’s the big secret?
[The car with Joe is turning. Leo’s car continues to drive straight ahead.]

Speaker: Vito
Text: Hey, hey! What’s the hell’s going on? Where are they taking Joe?

Speaker: Leo Galante
Text: Sorry, kid. Joe wasn’t part of our deal.
[While Vito is figuring out his options, the camera moves back, showing us the panorama of the city, covered by pouring rain.]
